full_summary:
## [Title] Request for Standing Offers for Scheduled and Ad Hoc On-Site Mobile and Off-Site Shredding Services for Secret Documents

### Overview

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) has issued a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the provision of scheduled and ad hoc on-site mobile and off-site shredding services for Secret documents at various ESDC locations throughout Canada.

### Objective

The objective of this RFSO is to obtain multiple Standing Offers (up to 3 per region) for the provision of scheduled and ad hoc on-site mobile and off-site shredding services for Secret documents in two geographic regions:

- Region 1: Ontario
- Region 2: Quebec

### Services Required

Shredding services will be categorized into four streams:

- Stream 1: Offsite Scheduled Destruction
- Stream 2: Offsite Ad-Hoc Destruction
- Stream 3: On-Site (Mobile) Scheduled Destruction
- Stream 4: On-Site (Mobile) Ad-Hoc Destruction

### Contract Period

The initial contract period will be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024. The contractor is also required to offer to extend the contract for an additional five (5) periods, each lasting one (1) year.

### Location of Services

Services will be required for approximately 110 ESDC sites across Canada, with the number of sites varying throughout the contract period.

### Evaluation Criteria

This RFSO will be evaluated on the basis of the following criteria:

- Compliance with the requirements outlined in the RFSO
- Vendor's experience and expertise in providing shredding services
- Pricing and scope of work

### Important Dates

- Publication date: November 02, 2022
- Tender closing date: January 20, 2023
- Evaluation and award of contract: As per procurement schedule

### Contact Information

- Contracting Authority: Employment and Social Development Canada
- Contact Person: None
- Contact Email: NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Documents

All documents related to this RFSO are available on the Canada Buys website.
